title: Federal Cabinet dissolved: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 3 (APP): Former Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Sunday said the Federal Cabinet had been dissolved.
Prime Minister Imran Khan, however, would continue his duties under Article 224 of the Constitution, he said in a tweet.
آئین کے آرٹیکل 224 کے تحت وزیر اعظم اپنی ذمہ داریاں جاری رکھیں گے کابینہ تحلیل کر دی گئ ہے
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) April 3, 2022
